keyPolicies.policyDescription: Successfully lobbied for extra police with 365 more working across Essex, including officers tackling rural crime and patrolling town centres, keeping residents and business safe.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A HEALTH SERVICE WE CAN BE PROUD OF
keyPolicies.policyDescription: £394 million more a week for the NHS delivered by the Conservatives. Local hospitals now have 1502 more doctors and nurses than in 2010. Princess Alexandra will share in £2.7 billion worth of funding as one of the first six hospitals to be rebuilt.

Worked with local teachers as an MP and minister, and delivered a funding increase for all primary and secondary school pupils. Will keep working for more increases and £500m p.a. investment in skills funding for 16-19 year olds.

issues.education: Delivered a funding increase for all primary and secondary school pupils.
issues.health: £394 million more a week for the NHS delivered by the Conservatives.
